term.title: congener

item.text: One of two or more substances related to each other by origin, structure, or function.

sources.item: PAC, 2004, 76, 1033. 'Glossary of terms used in toxicokinetics (IUPAC Recommendations 2003)' on page 1046 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200476051033)

term.citation: Citation: 'congener' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.CT06819

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
